articles.author: Sean Hollister
articles.title: Microsoft Teams went down around the world for over eight hours — it's recovering - The Verge
articles.description: Microsoft Teams is down — with outages in North America, South America, Europe, the Middle East, and Africa, according to the latest status update from Microsoft’s official account.
articles.content:
Microsoft Teams went down around the world for over eight hours its recovering
